author: 444𝓢𝓱𝔂🏳️‍🌈
text: I just love everyone okay ☺️🧿 The world is my family. You is loved if you don’t feel loved.

author: 444𝓢𝓱𝔂🏳️‍🌈
text: Why can’t we all be one color. I’m so tired of all of this. 😕

author: 444𝓢𝓱𝔂🏳️‍🌈
text: I really don’t understand why people find an excuse to be racist. It’s not that fucking hard like. Wtf 😫😐 is hard ? Is it? Cuz wtf did anybody do for you to hate that much.

author: 444𝓢𝓱𝔂🏳️‍🌈
text: Please please please fucking please from people who work at restaurants. Stop coming if you sick. I don’t wanna get sick fam. Idgaf what you got going on. Take out food is not that serious.
